page.title: 10WHY VISITORS COME TO LERRYN
page.content: Why do people come on holiday to this area? I think people come to the Lerryn,and Boconnoc area because of it's beautiful countryside, yet it's not too far from places such as {Plymouth}and{Truro. There are{holiday cottages}and {bed and breakfast}places to be found at inexpensive prices. It is very nice to go{horse {riding}along the country lanes. In spring there are many beautiful{flowers}to be seen in the hedge-rows. Many people come to the river for relaxation, for{sailing and {boating. Some people come to the{Boconnoc {Estate}to study the{lichens}which form one of the most extensive and varied collections in Europe.
